channel.title: How to
channel.description: how to delete the construction stuff from the client without errors i tried twice and same stuff, the code is fr33scape, can any1 help with this? :confused:

item.title: How to
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

This is to totally remove summoning from your server.

Find,

/*SUMMONING*/

and click just above it. Donâ€™t click anywhere else on your page, apart from your find panel.

Now find,

/*MISC*/

and then hold shift and click just after the } above it. This should select all of your summoning.

Delete that selection, then compile.

Read full topic
